name: Martinique
description:
Demo project for GodotEngine 3.x

Martinique is located in the Lesser Antilles in the eastern Caribbean Sea.

Fly in explore mode

  • mouse - look
  • WSAD - movement
  • Q/E - up/down
  • ESC - quit

Tools

  • GodotEngine (3.x)
  • Gimp 2.10.0-RC1
  • Wings3D 2.1.5

Hardware

  • nVidia 1050
  • i3-7100
  • 8GB DDR4

Full sources: https://github.com/w84death/Martinique
